# Carbon Copy

> Beautiful vintage form UI components for React
> Package: @prnv/carbon-copy

Carbon Copy is a React component library for building authentic carbon copy forms with typewriter aesthetics. Inspired by 1970s automotive build orders and vintage business documents.

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install @prnv/carbon-copy
```

```tsx
import '@prnv/carbon-copy/styles.css';
import { FormField, VintageTable, Checkbox, DenseGrid } from '@prnv/carbon-copy';
```

## Components

- **FormField** - Text inputs (underline, boxed, handwriting, dotted, minimal)
- **Checkbox** - X or checkmark styles
- **VintageTable** - Dense data tables
- **StrikethroughCell** - Cross-hatch pattern for N/A
- **DenseGrid** - Zero-gap grid layouts
- **SectionHeader** - Styled headers
- **OptionRow** - Label + code rows
- **CodeTable** - Code/description tables
- **YearBadge** - Decorative badges
- **FormLayout** - Template layouts

## Design Tokens

Colors: Primary #324D88 (navy), Accent #8B1538 (maroon), Background #A8D5D8 (teal)
Fonts: Berkeley Mono, American Typewriter, Courier (typewriter stack)

## Full Documentation

- Complete docs: https://carbon-copy.dev/docs
- Full AI reference: https://carbon-copy.dev/llms-full.txt
